data.title: Films by Benjamin the A.I.
data.meta_description: ​ Sunspring .  The first film ever written entirely by an artificial intelligence. Written by "Benjamin" - a collaboration with  Ross Goodwin . Starring  Thomas Middleditch, Elisabeth...
